about_the_game:
Nogalious is a pixel-art action adventure set in a medieval-themed universe with plenty of puzzles and menacing challenges. Take on the role of Nogalious, a former knight of the Kingdom of Russadir, and explore 5 different worlds to save your daughter Mariet from the evil claws of Darama.

It has an engaging soundtrack of twenty different pieces to add mood and atmosphere to the game, offering a well time of quality music. This soundtrack was make by Gryzor87 (Cursed Castilla, Super Hydorah, Battle Princess Madelyn ...). This DLC package offers the entire OST in WAV format, so you can listen to it whenever you want. On behalf of the Nogalious team, enjoy!!

Track list is as follows:

1.- Main Title
2.- The Story
3.- The Kidnap
4.- Tutorial
5.- World I - The Village
6.- World I - Zovach
7.- World II - The Cemetery
8.- World II - Grotton
9.- World III - The Castle
10.- World III - Harmor
11.- World IV - The Dangeon
12.- World IV - Lordak
13.- World V - The Tower
14.- World V - Darama
15.- The Final Fight
16.- The End
17.- Credits
18.- Leadersboard
19.- Speak With Me
20 Game Over

Guide:

After purchasing this DLC, you can enjoy in the music player either in-game or on your PC.
Feel free to share them with your friends ;-) Thank you for your support.

name: Nogalious OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

This soundtrack was make by Gryzor87 (Cursed Castilla, Super Hydorah, Battle Princess Madelyn ...). This DLC package offers the entire OST in MP3 format, so you can listen to it whenever you want.
